name: DocumentPreset
shortdesc: The new document preset to use for creating a new document.

property.name: title
property.shortdesc: The title for the new document.

property.name: width
property.shortdesc: The width for the new document.

property.name: height
property.shortdesc: The height for the new document.

property.name: numArtboards
property.shortdesc: Number of artboards for new document.Range (1:100).

property.name: artboardRowsOrCols
property.shortdesc: Number of rows (for rows layout) OR column(for column layouts)of artboards.Range is 1 to (docNumArtboards - 1) or 1 for single row or column layouts.

property.name: colorMode
property.shortdesc: The color mode for the new document.

property.name: units
property.shortdesc: The units for the new document.

property.name: previewMode
property.shortdesc: The preview mode for the new document.

property.name: rasterResolution
property.shortdesc: The raster resolution for the new document.

property.name: transparencyGrid
property.shortdesc: The transparency grid for the new document.
